title: Blended Education Program for Enhancing Medical Procedure Skills

context.prior_knowledge: Basic medical terminology and human anatomy comprehension
context.additional_context: Practical skills-focused education for training COVID-19 response medical personnel, incorporating learner personal devices, virtual simulations, and actual equipment during hands-on training.

learning_goals: Learners can explain the nasal specimen collection procedure with 90% accuracy
Learners can perform intramuscular injection practice with 80% accuracy while adhering to standard safety protocols
Improve technical performance confidence by 40% or more through peer assessment in a blended learning environment
Meeting course completion requirements is achieved when formative assessment scores reach 85 or above three consecutive times
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
